name: flox
description: Flox is a self-hosted task and kanban tool designed to organize personal or project-based workflows. It includes board views, tasks, labels, and drag-and-drop interactions in a simple clean UI.
features: Task Management: Kanban boards, Task organization, Labels and drag-and-drop. Simple project workflows.
Board Views: Visual task management. Clear overview.
Personal or Team: Flexible for any use case. Scalable organization.
Clean UI: Minimal and functional. Focus on tasks.
Due Dates: Set deadlines. Time management.
Checklists: Break down tasks. Detailed tracking.
Attachments: Add files to tasks. Complete context.
Self-Hosted: Your tasks stay private. Full control.
